title: definevalue
author: definevalue
created_time: July 18, 2023, 03:03:35 PMLast edit: September 07, 2023, 07:18:13 AM by definevalue
content: As title states If your looking for any kind of payment method I do have it if your looking to buy crypto though I will only accept cash-in-mail, bank-wire, Western Union, Moneygram, or Walmart-2--Walmart.This isn't only for me to get traction building trust in the community, but also to help provide a service that I really feel is necessary thing to keep the privacy and I'm not keen with some of the outrageous prices I've seen as far as it goes with being anonymous

comments.author: urbanmerchant
